de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.lsh.hashfamilies

Class CosineHashFunctionFamily

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.lsh.hashfamilies.CosineHashFunctionFamily
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<NumberVector>

    @Reference(authors="M.S. Charikar",
           title="Similarity estimation techniques from rounding algorithms",
           booktitle="Proc. 34th ACM Symposium on Theory of computing, STOC\'02",
           url="https://dx.doi.org/10.1145%2F509907.509965")
public class CosineHashFunctionFamily
extends Object
implements LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<NumberVector>
    Hash function family to use with Cosine distance. Reference:

    M.S. Charikar
    Similarity estimation techniques from rounding algorithms
    Proc. 34th ACM Symposium on Theory of computing, STOC'02

    Author:
    Evgeniy Faerman
